摖字的基本解释

摖
qì
挑取。

摖
jì
　ㄐㄧˋ
古同“祭”：“俚歌成调笑，摖鬼聚喧嚣。”

摖
chá
　ㄔㄚˊ
推。

摖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qì］
［《廣韻》七計切，去霽，清。］
祭。参见“摖鬼”。

摖字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摖； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页449第29
【唐韻】【集韻】?七計切，音砌。挑取也。又【集韻】初戛切，音察。推也。

摖字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
摖字的起名意思

暂无。

ㄐ ㄧˋ
Gu Tong "Ji": "The slang song becomes a joke, and the ghosts gather in the hustle and bustle."

ㄔ ㄚ ˉ

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qì］
["Guangyun" Seven Strategies Cut, Go Ji, Qing. ]
Sacrifice. See "Ghost".
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Words Department] 　摖; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 449 29
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven tricks, the sound is built. Pick too. Also 【Jiyun】Cut at the beginning, and the sound is observed. Push also.
